title: Looking for a gfirlfriend
body:
need plat or higher gf. 

I have 15 mill runescape gp. 

Buying gf.

replies.body: Please... It's 2017. You'll need way more than 15m for a gf. I can make that in a few hours while AFK.
Will give you happy ending for rp
Ready and willing. Will my peepee be an issue?
